name: Eric Valk
description: Am a loyal, trustworthy, genuine man looking for someone to enjoy life with.And It has to be long term relationship. I like to take one day at a time, and see what happens. I am outgoing, humorous, sincere, understanding and good hearten. I am passionate and very romantic. The thing that I appreciate most in a partner is Honesty, trust and strong ability to communicate with one another no matter what it is, “either of us has to say”! The keys to a lasting relationship are trust, communication, understanding and being each others best friend! The most important factor is finding someone that knows what it means to compromise and be together
